TitleEnglish: If My Favorite Pop Idol Made It to the Budokan, I Would Die
SummaryEnglish: A girl called "Eripiyo" is an extreme idol fan. She is wildly enthusiastic about Maina, the shy and lowest-ranking member of the minor underground idol group Cham Jam that performs in Okayama Prefecture. She gets so wrapped up in her love for Maina during a particular performance, that she has a major nosebleed. Eri will continue to give her complete devotion to Maina until the day she can perform at Budoukan (a major performing venue in Tokyo).
Aliases: Oshi ga Budoukan Itte Kuretara Shinu
